column6: This is a Hair and Body Wash..?
column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2021
column14: The "soap" is white in color and feels almost like a lotion.  It lathers up after a fair amount of work..but the smell reminds me more of the old Oxy zit cream you'd put on as a kid.  For real.  It's not a pleasant smell.  I have zero idea how this is getting good reviews.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
column14: I really really like Dr tusk after one shower. Great suds and great cleaning. I do not smell the soap which is disappointing but maybe the smell will become more pronounced after a few uses. So far great clean, no smell

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2020
column14: I love the smell of this cleanser and save it for special occasions!.. It completely cleans out my hair so it's definitely not a daily shampoo for me, but when I need a full cleanse reset, this is my go-to! It's fairly runny so it works well with a loofah.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
column14: I like the fragrance which surprised me. Lathers well and takes less to use than I thought. I will buy again and check to see if different fragrances are available too.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2022
column14: I like the all natural ingredients,  makes my skin feel soft and smooth, plus you help out the elephants. I bought one cause it was a hemp product and am now a return customer.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
column14: Great quality body wash and the scent isn’t too overwhelming like some other men’s body wash brands.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2020
column14: Quite a distinct scent on this wash. I think you'll either love it or hate it.  For me it smells nice but quite strong. The soap/washing effect is pretty on par with you traditional body wash. I think if you like the cedarwood smell, you'll like it.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2021
column14: I really liked this body soap.  Smells great.  I would definitely buy again when it runs out.  Plus it helps the elephants!
